messages.subject: Child-led?
messages.msgSnippet: I am currently learning about how my computer is put together. I had the case off last night and was moving my memory chips around. BOTH girls (5 and 2) were
messages.messageBody:
I am currently learning about how my computer is put together. I had the case off last night and was moving my memory chips around. BOTH girls (5 and 2) were very interested in what I was doing. They asked many, many questions and even Annie understood what I was telling her. I guess this technically isn't "child-led" learning. Unless you consider me a child, which I guess I am! (giggle)
I have found an astounding hunger to learn about everything lately. I am sick of having problems with my 'puter and not knowing what to do about it- I am even considering building a new one (maybe----if $$ wasn't an issue!).
Eve said "Mommy, when you are done building a new 'puter, will you build me a TV for my room?" I just love the NO-LIMIT mentality they have!
Reenie
Big day here- going to see "Return to Neverland"- utopia for a 5yo Peter Pan addict!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
